# Task Manager CLI

## Usage

### List tasks
```bash
node dist/cli.js list --data <path>
```

### Add task
```bash
node dist/cli.js add "Task title" --data <path>
```

### Mark task as done
```bash
node dist/cli.js done <id> --data <path>
```

### Remove task
```bash
node dist/cli.js remove <id> --data <path>
```

notes: This project provides a simple task manager CLI with basic CRUD operations. The `TaskStore` class handles the storage and manipulation of tasks, while the `cli.ts` file implements the command-line interface.
